entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 40 percent chance of flurries early this evening. Flurries beginning early this evening. Blowing snow over exposed areas this evening. Local amount 2 cm. Wind northwest 40 km/h gusting to 60 becoming west 30 gusting to 50 this evening. Temperature rising to plus 2 by morning. Wind chill minus 10 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming west 20 in the morning. High plus 5. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 4:00 PM NDT Sunday 9 April 2023

entry.title: Monday night: Clear. Low minus 2.
